platformSettings.platforms.title: Platform definitions.
platformSettings.platforms.markdownDescription: Define each platform. Supports operating system (`linux`, `win32`, `darwin`, `freebsd`, and `sunos`), computer `hostname`, and custom NodeJS condition if `platformSettings.condition` is specified. Each platform supports `nodes{}` and `remove[]`.

platformSettings.autoLoad.title: Automatically load platform settings.
platformSettings.autoLoad.markdownDescription: Specifies whether platform-settings should be applied automatically on startup.

platformSettings.condition.title: Custom condition.
platformSettings.condition.markdownDescription: Specify a custom NodeJS condition. For example `os.release()`.
